model.name: ONCE Server Hierarchy Client-Server Model
model.title: ONCE Server Hierarchy Client-Server Model
model.description: When default ONCE server starts without parameters, it uses port 42777. If address is in use, it starts a ONCE ns client in process, registers with the default ONCE server, and starts on next available port 8080+ (counting up on each address in use error). Each server becomes a client to the default ONCE server. This creates a hierarchical server model where the first instance on port 42777 acts as the name server for subsequent instances.
